channel.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
channel.description:
I know a lot of you here have played Runescape AT least 1 time in your life.
Who started in 01/02/03? Have you logged on recently? If so, do you have extraneous amounts of wealth because of RSC?

item.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:413736”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=515697.msg3741016#msg3741016 date=1315347777]
If so, do you have extraneous amounts of wealth because of RSC?
[/quote]I think you meant to say:

“How many people have lots of money but don’t play anymore”, and then you’d reply with “if you dont play it anymore could I have it”[/quote]
OR rather so he can recover them
@Blood

Spare me claws/phat?

Read full topic
item.source: The last time you logged on Runescape?

item.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:9, topic:413736”]BloodRayne, is that the same account that at one point Cabby and I were sharing with you. By sharing I mean you let us play it for about ~1 month while it had no membership.

If so, very nice![/quote]

I think this was after that, you’re probably thinking Splitt3r or Jacob031? Or Evilmagic345 ;o Not sure. lol

Thanks ;p

Read full topic

If so, very nice!

item.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Last time logged in was about a month ago, started playing on 03, created this account in 08

My plan was to sell all my wealth but then gold prices went to usd .40/m so I was like lol na

Read full topic

item.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:413736”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=515697.msg3741016#msg3741016 date=1315347777]
If so, do you have extraneous amounts of wealth because of RSC?
[/quote]I think you meant to say:

“How many people have lots of money but don’t play anymore”, and then you’d reply with “if you dont play it anymore could I have it”[/quote]
No. I don’t play RS anymore.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:4, topic:413736”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=515697.msg3741016#msg3741016 date=1315347777]
I know a lot of you here have played Runescape AT least 1 time in your life.

Who started in 01/02/03? Have you logged on recently? If so, do you have extraneous amounts of wealth because of RSC?
[/quote]
you mean because they multiplied all the runes by 4 - 6 (I don’t remember the exact number)? when rs2 first came out yes everyone was wealthy because blood runes still had been priced at 1- 5k ea. but everyone’s stock was multiplied. but it took a matter of hours to cripple the prices of runes.

I had aquired the most money during the rs2 beta, mainly because when using party pete’s drop party chest you could put any number in for the put X of ____ option when it came to putting items in the chest, do you know what 99k red party hats sells for?

sadly our accounts never kept those items but it was extremely fun while it lasted.[/quote]
Assuming it was patched right after beta?

Read full topic
item.source: The last time you logged on Runescape?

item.title: The last time you logged on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:413736”]I know a lot of you here have played Runescape AT least 1 time in your life.

Who started in 01/02/03? Have you logged on recently? If so, do you have extraneous amounts of wealth because of RSC?[/quote]
you mean because they multiplied all the runes by 4 - 6 (I don’t remember the exact number)? when rs2 first came out yes everyone was wealthy because blood runes still had been priced at 1- 5k ea. but everyone’s stock was multiplied. but it took a matter of hours to cripple the prices of runes.

I had aquired the most money during the rs2 beta, mainly because when using party pete’s drop party chest you could put any number in for the put X of ____ option when it came to putting items in the chest, do you know what 99k red party hats sells for?

sadly our accounts never kept those items but it was extremely fun while it lasted.

Read full topic
